name: Mr. White (Lorex Games)
description:
Mr. White NOTE: This is a DEMO version of my new horror game called Mr. White. CONTROLS:

Movement: W, A, S, D

LSHIFT to Run

LMB to Open Doors, Drawers, Hide under the Bed, and Pickup Items

Q to Drop Items

You're trapped inside White's creepy house, you have to find a way to escape without getting caught.
